subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Scott Clemmensen made 26 saves to improve to 7-1 in his last eight starts, and the Devils won with a 4-1 win over the Pittsburgh Penguins.
snippet: Scott Clemmensen made 26 saves to improve to 7-1 in his last eight starts, and the Devils won with a 4-1 win over the Pittsburgh Penguins.
